snippet: Timbre, an app that came out this month, presents the user with a simple list of bands playing nearby and provides samples of the music.
abstract: App City column on Timbre, iPhone app by Intrepid Pursuits that tells users what concerts are happening nearby.
lead_paragraph: Timbre, an app that came out this month, presents the user with a simple list of bands playing nearby and provides samples of the music.

headline.print_headline: A Concert Finder for the Open-Minded
headline.seo: Timbre Offers Previews of a Variety of Bands Playing Nearby
headline.main: A Concert Finder for the Open-Minded
